name: Portal Breakout
description:
Portal breakout is a combination of Pong and breakout where the paddles are portals, Instead of bouncing on the paddles the ball teleports to the other portal.

The goal of the game is to remove all blocks from the level.

I created the game for the weekly game jam 174. The theme is tennis.

Controls:

Left paddle W and S.
Right paddle Up and Down arrow.
